result.html: Bhain an madra greim asamThe dog bit me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain an madra greim asamThe dog bit me.

result.eng: The meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
result.ga: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asam
result.orig: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asam
result.html: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asamThe meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
result.ponchtml: Ṡúiġ an cruinniú an fuinneaṁ ar fad asamThe meeting sucked all my energy out of me.

result.html: Baineadh siar asamI was taken aback.
result.ponchtml: Baineaḋ siar asamI was taken aback.

result.eng: The images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ga: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.orig: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.html: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain na híoṁánna bíogaḋ asam lena gcuid áilleaċta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.
